string-enumeration.name: type
string-enumeration.label: Analysis Type
string-enumeration.description: Type of Analysis: "Human Analysis" or "Mouse Analysis"

directory.name: basedir
directory.label: Base Directory
directory.description: Parent folder or collection for the current image

double.name: slider
double.label: Slider
double.description: A number (float) establishing the threshold on the dab stain; options include any number [0,3]

integer.name: section_thickness
integer.label: Section Thickness
integer.description: A number (integer) indicating the tissue section thickness [0,15]

string-enumeration.name: num_sections
string-enumeration.label: Number of Sections
string-enumeration.description: Number of tissue sections per slide (for WSIs of murine whole kidney sections options are 1 or 2; for human biopsy data, set to 1)

double.name: ihc_gauss_sd
double.label: IHC Guassian SD
double.description: Gaussian Standard Deviation for IHC processing [0.5, 5]

double.name: dt_gauss_sd
double.label: DT Guassian SD
double.description: Gaussian Standard Deviation for Distance Transform [0.5, 5]

integer.name: max_major
integer.label: Max Major Axis Length
integer.description: Maximum allowed major axis length for podocytes [30,100]

integer.name: min_minor
integer.label: Min Minor Axis Length
integer.description: Minimum allowed minor axis length for podocytes [5,30]

parameters.label: Girder API URL and Key
parameters.description: A Girder API URL and token for Girder client

string.name: girderToken
string.label: Girder API Token
string.description: A Girder token identifying a user session
